# University Logos

Upload university logo files to this folder with the following filenames:

- harvard.png
- yale.png
- stanford.png
- mit.png
- princeton.png
- columbia.png
- oxford.png
- cambridge.png
- imperial.png
- uc-berkeley.png
- brown.png
- duke.png
- uchicago.png
- nyu.png
- ucla.png

**Note:** Logo images should be square or close to square for best display. PNG or SVG formats recommended.
